comments:
Build ID: M20070921-1145

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Simple copy and paste in java text editor begins to fail.
2.Paste begins to report: "Paste" did not complete normally.  Please see the log for more information."
3.Restarting clears the problem. 
Cannot reproduce consistently but gets into this state about once per day. Copy and paste on other apps on the system continue working normally.


More information:
Here's the stack trace and session information:

Other information:

Intel 6600 Quad-core
Duong and SN to investigate to determine how this exception can happen.
I've seen people having problems with copy/paste on KDE desktops if the Klipper applet is in use. (If you are using Klipper, try to see if turning it off helps).

(In reply to comment #2)
> I've seen people having problems with copy/paste on KDE desktops if the Klipper
> applet is in use. (If you are using Klipper, try to see if turning it off
> helps).
> 

This is a stock Gnome installation with no special clipboard software.
